subject: fix: capture validation failures for reprocessing instead of skipping
body:
Both scripts now write malformed commits to needs-reprocess.json files
instead of silently skipping them:

save-commit.js:
- Validates all required fields before saving
- Valid commits are saved, invalid ones written to needs-reprocess.json
- Exits with error if any commits failed validation
- Clear error messages explaining what went wrong

aggregate-processed.js:
- Loudly reports all malformed commits during aggregation
- Writes them to processed/<repo>/needs-reprocess.json
- Shows warning at end of output

This ensures validation failures are visible and actionable rather
than silently lost.
